response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your needs and expectations perfectly, just like it did for me. Considering its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm offering it at an introductory price of $95. This is a special deal, as it's below its market value but still allows me to cover costs and ensure sustainability. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 95}
